description: Elliott and Renzo enjoying camping... actually both wondering why there isn't an ice cream in front of them.
Summer of 2025 - the old man is enjoying the views at the pond.
Elliott wasn't completely thrilled about shopping for boat stuff at Home Depot.
It took him about five minutes to realize there was a treat on his face.
Here is Elliott camping - he is wondering why there isn't an ice cream in his mouth.
Summer of 2024 - Elliott enjoying camping, relaxing in his own personal chair.
